scripts.generate-icons: sharp -i public/icon2.svg -o public/apple-touch-icon.png resize 180 180 && sharp -i public/icon2.svg -o public/icon-192.png resize 192 192 && sharp -i public/icon2.svg -o public/icon-512.png resize 512 512
scripts.generate-splash: sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-2778-1284.jpg resize 2778 1284 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-2532-1170.jpg resize 2532 1170 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-2388-1668.jpg resize 2388 1668 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-2224-1668.jpg resize 2224 1668 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-2048-1536.jpg resize 2048 1536 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-1792-828.jpg resize 1792 828 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-1242-2688.jpg resize 1242 2688 && sharp -i public/splash.svg -o public/splash/apple-splash-1242-2208.jpg resize 1242 2208
